title: Palantir, DoorDash, Nvidia, Hasbro: What to Watch in the Stock Market Today
sub_head: Palantir Technologies reported earnings that came in below expectations; An activist investor began a proxy fight with Hasbro
body:
Stock futures declined after Western officials said they weren’t seeing a de-escalation on the Ukrainian border, despite Moscow’s claims of troop withdrawals. Here’s what we’re watching in markets on Thursday.
Write to Anna Hirtenstein at anna.hirtenstein@wsj.com
